objectsDB package¶

Submodules¶

objectsDB.functions module¶

objectsDB.load_status_from_google_docs module¶

objectsDB.objectsDB module¶

objectsDB.process_categories module¶

Module contents¶

A module for building up the project objects that build up the project database on statusdb with lims as the main source of information.

Maya Brandi, Science for Life Laboratory, Stockholm, Sweden.

class objectsDB.InitialQC(lims_inst, sample, procs_per_art, application)[source]¶
set_initialqc_info()[source]¶
class objectsDB.Prep(sample_name)[source]¶
set_prep_info(steps, aplication)[source]¶
class objectsDB.ProcessInfo(lims_instance, processes)[source]¶

This class takes a list of process type names. Eg ‘Aggregate QC (Library Validation) 4.0’ and forms a dict with info about all processes of the type specified in runs which the project has gon through.

info = {24-8460:{

‘start_date’ ‘samples’:{‘P424_111’:{in_art_id1 : [in_art1, out_art1],

in_art_id2: [in_art2, out_art2]},
‘P424_115’: ...},
...},

‘24-8480’:...}

class objectsDB.ProcessSpec(hist_sort, hist_list, application)[source]¶
class objectsDB.ProjectDB(lims_instance, project_id, samp_db)[source]¶

Instances of this class holds a dictionary formatted for building up the project database on statusdb. Source of information come from different lims artifacts and processes.

build_processes_per_artifact(lims, pname)[source]¶

Constructs a dictionary linking each artifact id with its processes. Other artifacts can be present as keys. All processes where the project is present should be included. The values of the dictionary is sets, to avoid duplicated projects for a single artifact.

class objectsDB.SampleDB(lims_instance, sample_id, project_name, samp_db, application=None, AgrLibQCs=[], run_info=[], processes_per_artifact=None)[source]¶

Instances of this class holds a dictionary formatted for building up the samples in the project database on status db. Source of information come from different lims artifacts and processes.

objectsDB.get_caliper_img(sample_name, caliper_id)[source]¶
objectsDB.get_last_first(process_list, last=True)[source]¶
objectsDB.udf_dict(element, exeptions=[], exclude=True)[source]¶

Takes a lims element and tertuns a dictionary of its udfs, where the udf names are trensformed to statusdb keys (underscore and lowercase).

exeptions and exclude = False - will return a dict with only the exeptions exeptions and exclude = True - will return a dict without the exeptions

Arguments:
element lims element (Sample, Artifact, Process, Project...) exeptions list of exception udf keys (underscore and lowercase) exlude (True/False)
